description.name: User can add an article reference

scenario.name: user can add an article reference with scandic letters

given.name: article author, title, year, volume and journal are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add an article reference without author name

given.name: article title, year, volume and journal are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add an article reference without title

given.name: article author, year, volume and journal are inserted
three references with article author, title, year, volume and journal are inserted

when.name: the other references have 3 and 5 numbers

then.name: reference with 4 numbers in year is added and the other with 3 and 5 numbers will not be added

scenario.name: user cannot add an article reference without volume

given.name: article author, title, year and journal are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add an article reference without journal

given.name: article author, title, year and volume are inserted

description.name: User can add a book reference

scenario.name: user can add a book reference with scandic letters

given.name: book author, title, year and publisher are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add a book reference without author name

given.name: book title, year and publisher are inserted

when.name: author name field is left empty

scenario.name: user cannot add a book reference without title

given.name: book author, year and publisher are inserted
three references with book author, title, year and publisher are inserted

when.name: the other references have 3 and 5 numbers

then.name: reference with 4 numbers in year is added and the other with 3 and 5 numbers will not be added

scenario.name: user cannot add a book reference without publisher

given.name: book author, title and year are inserted

description.name: User can add an inproceedings reference

scenario.name: user can add an inproceedings reference with scandic letters

given.name: inproceedings author, title, year, volume and journal are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add an inproceedings reference without author name

given.name: inproceedings title, year and booktitle are inserted

scenario.name: user cannot add an inproceedings reference without title

given.name: inproceedings author, year and booktitle are inserted
three references with article author, title, year, volume and journal are inserted

when.name: the other references have 3 and 5 numbers

then.name: reference with 4 numbers in year is added and the other with 3 and 5 numbers will not be added

scenario.name: user cannot add an inproceedings reference without booktitle

given.name: inproceedings author, title, year and journal are inserted

description.name: User can review a reference in bibtex format

scenario.name: user can review a reference in bibtex format

when.name: a book reference has been made

then.name: a reference is printed in bibtex format
reference is saved to the disk

description.name: User get a listing of references

scenario.name: user can get a list of references

then.name: prints added references to the command line
